sourcesContent:
<template>
  <LMap :center="[47, 12.0]" :zoom="4" style="width: 400px; height: 400px">
    <l-tile-layer
      url="https://tiles.stadiamaps.com/tiles/alidade_smooth_dark/{z}/{x}/{y}{r}.png"
      layer-type="base"
      name="Stadia Maps Basemap"
    ></l-tile-layer>

    <LMarker
      v-for="plkIcon in PLKIcons"
      :key="plkIcon.icon"
      :icon="`${iconPath}/${plkIcon.icon}.png`"
    />
  </LMap>

  <!-- {
    "name": "Twarde Pierniki",
    "latitude": 53.01774180895404,
    "longitude": 18.58839335478321,
    "icon": "TwardePierniki",
    "league": "PLK"
  }, -->
  <!-- url="https://tiles.stadiamaps.com/tiles/alidade_smooth_dark/{z}/{x}/{y}{r}.png" -->
</template>

<script setup>
import "leaflet/dist/leaflet.css";
import { LMap, LTileLayer, LMarker } from "@vue-leaflet/vue-leaflet";
import PLKIcons from "./JsonMarkers/plkMarkers.json";

const iconPath = "../../public/league-icons/plk";

</script>
